comments.content: Turns out that hacking was backlevel, was running against 0.7.0 rather than the latest (0.7.2).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Re-opened because I'd like to pin hacking >= 0.7.2 in openstack-requirements here using this bug, there have been a few of these lately:

https://github.com/openstack/requirements/blob/master/global-requirements.txt#L108
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: See the comments in the review for why this is invalid.
